short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick access to daily Sudoku challenges from Sudoku Mood

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Play a fresh Sudoku Online every day!

Pin Sudoku Mood to your toolbar, choose your preferred difficulty level, and quickly open your daily Sudoku challenge. The extension icon changes to show if you’ve already solved today’s puzzle.

Sudoku Mood is easy to use and fun to play. Here’s why you’ll love it:

Great Puzzles: Enjoy carefully crafted Sudoku puzzles of the highest quality.
Animated hints: Our intelligent hint function will help you to get better at solving Sudoku.
Less Ads: We keep ads to a minimum so you can focus on playing.
Modern Look: Clean design with cool features for a smooth experience.
Daily Challenges: Play a new puzzle every day with different levels to match your mood.
